content: And then I'll sunbathe on the rooftop with friends, sound good? It's alright, here, take it. Do whatever you like with it. Bhan!

content: I sketched this back when I was hitching rides—I mean, traveling around. At the time, I thought maybe one day, I'll build a stone house just like this.

content: Livin' free! Oh right... While poking around yesterday, I found this <style=Highlight>Luminescent Stone House Blueprint</style>!
